website_summaries.verdict: A dirt-cheap alternative to mounted pendant lights, this swag light provides versatility in any room with a wall outlet, and is lightweight enough even to hang from panel ceilings.
pros: Fast installation with included hooks, and users were pleased with the versatility provided by an outlet cord rather than wiring to an electrical box
cons: Plastic canopy may be damaged by using bulbs with too high a wattage, so stick to 60W bulbs
Numerous reports of plastic dome warping in shipping

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I have it hanging over my kitchen table. Because it's so light weight it's held by a hook that is screwed into the ceiling. I've been looking for something that I wouldn't need an electrician for and sure found it. I also bought bought the wireless wall switch that was suggested by Amazon and it all looks great! I'm adding a note after a week. This is so inexpensive but doesn't look it. I've had so many compliments and it really does the job I hoped for. Also, we like to work jigsaw puzzles and this provides the correct light.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly C

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic that does not hold the round shape...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and it came deformed because it was not fitting properly the Styrofoam in the manufacturer box, so I returned it and asked for a replacement. Guess what? Same problem with the second....I am returning it and not ordering anymore of them, I already lost too much time on this....and I trusted the reviews....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got the hanging lamp that looks like a bowl
customer_reviews.text: I got the hanging lamp that looks like a bowl. The lamp was a game changer for my somewhat dark apartment and I recommend it to everyone. The plastic looks like glass but won't fall and shatter when a clumsy person like me hangs it up. It's absolutely wonderful! It's a bit hard to photograph a light source, so I included a photo of how nicely it lights the breakfast bar in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved to an old town home that had no overhead lighting in our bedroom. This was the perfect solution! Arrived in no time & was so easy to install, it even came with 2 hooks for hanging & 2 pieces that prevent the cord from pulling. The picture shows before & after; used a 60 watt soft white bulb & it floods the room with light without the dreaded "spotlight" effect. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazard
customer_reviews.text: Switch is not functioning properly. Sparking coming from inside the switch mechanism. Unplugging and returning. Fire hazard
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: I literally just installed this light and I love it! It works perfectly for my needs and ...
customer_reviews.text: I literally just installed this light and I love it! It works perfectly for my needs and is nice and bright (even with a 60 watt bulb).
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feel but doesn't look horrible
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product. The 'cup' part is softer than I thought it would be (feels like a heavy duty disposable plastic cup) and it's not deep enough to 'hide' the bulb underneath. It serves its purpose and I guess that's good enough for us. I do however feel a tiny bit deceived by the pictures posted on the ad for this one.
customer_reviews.author: GALLONE

customer_reviews.title: Hanging Lamp Fills Need at Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Nobody would mistake this hanging lamp as a high-end luxury item but I am happy with it. I got it to replace a similar style item that had been turning ugly for a long time and then finally broke. I would not mind if it would be a little larger, but with a bright enough bulb there is plenty of light. After a few days, it looks as at home as the previous model. The quality is sufficient and the price was rigjht. I should also note that I initially planned to shop locally, but decided Amazon was more convenient because I knew they had the item I wanted at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Watson - Writer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! This was very easy to put together and I was able to hang it up on the wall and ceiling very easily with some hooks from my DIY store since the hooks that come with the lamp didn’t look especially sturdy. I’ve connected mine to the switch outlet (see pics) that amazon sells as well and it’s been a total game changer. My only recommendation is to not hang it too high where you can’t clean it. It collects dusts pretty quickly. Great amount of light and not horrible looking. For the money, you really can’t beat this.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby P.

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I used an extension cord after making sure it would work safely. This is perfect and provides great lighting above a desk or table. I used two hooks to that came with it to support the lamp. It’s light weight and an easy assembly. My only slight critique is that sometimes the bulb doesn’t hang perfectly down the center but you can adjust the lamp. It does it’s job well and I think it’s worth the value. If you’re looking for a more decorative lamp you may want something else but that comes with a greater risk of crashing or shattering so I like that this is plastic... since I could install it effortlessly
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive overhead lamp.
customer_reviews.text: It may seem a little odd but I'm very happy that this light is plastic and not glass... I bought two of these to hang in my children's rooms. We have no overhead lighting in our home and these are the perfect solution. I was worried that my children would break them if they were actual glass lamps. They don't look like the most expensive lamps on the market, actually they are quite obviously plastic, but they light the rooms well and I don't have to worry about them breaking, because let's be honest kids do dumb crap in their rooms and break stuff. Overall I'm very pleased and might order two more for the other two bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Emme

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect but please fix this problem
customer_reviews.text: Almost made my top 10 list of great merchandise I've bought online (mostly at Amazon). Good stuff: Easy to put together Long 15' clear cord No electrician required Inexpensive However the plastic shade is not round and I couldn't reshape it. I think it would just take a circular metal hoop to keep it in shape and might make it look just a bit more substantial, or possibly a more rigid plastic. I'd easily pay a bit more to solve this problem. Have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Pryor

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I live in a basement apartment that has no direct light over my kitchen counter. I have tried both battery stick up lights for the ceiling & under counter. I ordered this light & actually put 2 clips on my drop down ceiling above the counter & hung the lamp wrapping the cord once around the first clip, threaded the cord through the second and brought the clear cord down the cabinet (hardly noticeable). Absolutely gives off all the light I need, perfect solution after trying 4 different types of lights. The cord length is a bonus. Very please with this light & the price is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hanging light for price. Easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp, and great price. It’s very easy to assemble. No one can screw the installation up. It comes with an installation kit and instructions. I purchase mine for my bedroom. Tired of using floor lamps, in addition to my bed side lamps. I’m so glad I purchased this. Because it’s a hanging light it actually looks brighter in my room now, as opposed to a floor lamp , which lighting was always faced up so it was dimmer. My only suggestion to the company,is maybe using a better material for the dome(white part) it looks good as is and it’s very light(plastic) but maybe something a little bit heavier would look prettier.
customer_reviews.author: @IG julesisresilient

customer_reviews.title: Too much spotlight for me
customer_reviews.text: It seems like good quality, just not for me. I got this because some reviewers claimed it was good as diffusing light and didn't have the spotlight effect. But I found that it did... at least too much of a spotlight for me. I returned this. Instead I got some light fixtures fromand some paper lanterns fromand it was more what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Paul Grand

customer_reviews.title: Warped shade...
customer_reviews.text: Like several other reviewers, I got one with a warped, out-of-round shade, and had to return it. The type of plastic the shade is made of just is not rigid enough to hold a round shape, so that it really looks bad hanging. (See photos from other reviews.) Too bad, because otherwise it would have been a nice little lamp at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Pencil Pusher

customer_reviews.title: Good durable swag lamp.  Works fine.  Good value
customer_reviews.text: This light works well, was easy to install. Does what it says its supposed to do. Good value. I didn't really like the cord relief device much but I think that's pretty standard. Its VERY lightweight though so if you have a ceiling fan going nearby it may swing around.
customer_reviews.author: Terry D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to a dark room
customer_reviews.text: This light fit perfect in the corner of my dark livingroom. It was easy to assemble. It looked just like the picture, I would say even better than the picture. Nice thick hard plastic that gives a higher end look. The cord was extremely long which is nice if you have high ceilings, however the on off switch was awkwardly placed at the lower end of the cord. I end up pulling the cord all the way up because I have it tucked behind a shelf in order to turn it on/off then I have to conceal it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lady T

customer_reviews.title: Great for Renters
customer_reviews.text: Moved into a new apartment with little built in lighting. Stumbled on this during my research for lighting options. I can see it easily being unable to tell we ever used this with just a tiny amount of putty. Great amount of light. Cord is plenty long. Kit has everything you need to put it up. 5 stars all around in price, quality for the price point, ease to install, and ability to light up a room well :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Nice for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I needed a overhead lamp in my kitchen right over the sink and this lamp work great! It was easy to install, cord 15 feet long...seems like it's way too long....but I bundled up the excess cord and tucked it away on top of a nearby kitchen cupboard and got a few screw-in wall hooks to keep the cord/plug in one spot. Easy to assemble and I used a 25 watt e26 base light bulb and works great! The on/off switch is directly on the cord. 5 stars overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey 440Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Perfect plug in light.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cheap way to light up a corner for my grandkids' art time. A table lamp would take up too much space, the supply bookcase was too tall to set one on top, and the space beneath wouldn't allow for a lamp base. This is perfect, hangs from the ceiling with enclosed hooks in minutes and the cord is long enough to make the height adjustable (maybe not for tall ceilings but I don't have them.
customer_reviews.author: Paula W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Adds light for visually impaired :-)
customer_reviews.text: Got this for over a table in an apartment with no ceiling lights. Super easy install & included drywall anchors are adequate for this light-weight lamp. I put in a "daylight" LED, 100 watt equivalent / high lumen output. For some this might be too bright but not for my mom with impaired vision. Her outlet is 3 ft off the ground, so it's plugged into a lighted outlet toggle switch. The in-line switch is kept on & she can easily see the toggle to turn on the lamp. Excess cord just curled up with a twist-tie.
customer_reviews.author: SaraG

customer_reviews.title: Became a fire hazard in 5 months - Switch shorted out
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, very light, simple and efficient. The unit is mostly plastic, but that's actually a benefit as it doesn't require a heavy-duty attachment device. The cord is long enough to tack to the wall and down the edge of the kitchen so it's not noticeable. UPDATE! I've had the lamp for 5 months and it stopped working. The on/off switch has shorted out and it's now a fire hazard. Do not buy this lamp and leave it plugged in at home.
customer_reviews.author: MoCee

customer_reviews.title: Simple Design That Looks and Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog with balance issues and have had broken lamps, shelves, even walls from her crashing into them. I finally decided to get some hanging lamps and liked the look and price of these ones. I’m so happy with them! I have two hanging in my living room and they work and look great. True, they aren’t ornate glass, but I like the simple, lightweight material and design. Because of the material, I can see how some people would have gotten bent lamp shades, but mine were a perfect bowl shape. I’m so excited that my dog can’t break any more lamps and wish I had found these sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Beckiboobear

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for a ceiling light
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and functions great. I used a smart bulb so I do not use the switch on the cord. My bulb is bright enough so I do not have a problem with brightness. Note that there are 2 eye hook included in the box to hang the lamp. I attached the word to the ceiling/wall with smaller cable hooks to not have a dangling cord. Cover is a little cheap but not completely flimsy, its sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: AngelR290

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHTENS UP THE AREA ENOUGH!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for this area that was turn to a work area. It's not expensive but reliable. And yes it's made out of plastic but considering it will be hanging on top of my head. I wouldn't want it to accidentally slip and fall on me or anyone else if it's made out of plastic. Besides...I I could probably use it in another area when I find something else.
customer_reviews.author: silchi24

customer_reviews.title: Dark corners no more!
customer_reviews.text: Lost count of how many of the "swag lamps" we have purchased over the last couple of years. They are well made, inexpensive and the perfect solution to "dark spots" in a room. I have put them over the kitchen sink, bathroom sinks and one in a dark corner of my living room. Put the hook that comes with the light up, hang the lamp, insert light bulb and....let there be light! I always buy the white shade to blend into any décor but did go off plan one time and got the red lamp shade, the color was nice and it didn't effect the color of the light thrown by the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: OverRover

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light at a Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: Would like for it to take a stronger light bulb. I have quite a long dining area and the 60w bulb or the equivalent isn’t quite bright enough but on a whole it is quite a good light and the price is definitely right.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Stylish lightweight affordable.
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfect for what we needed. It was here in 2 days as promised and worked exactly as we expected. It is stylish, lightweight, and super affordable so great for anyone with a small space and limited budget. We have had it about a month now and I actually ended up recommending this to a friend who was looking for something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Monica From nj

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: We’re in the middle of renovating our home, but needed lights temporarily for a few months, and these were the right price. First off, they look on the cheaper side, but they’re easy to install, and get the job done. All in all, they’re great for the price, and we’ll probably find a place for them when they’re no longer needed as a main light source in a room
customer_reviews.author: Anna k.

customer_reviews.title: Great Light for rental kichen
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. My apartment doesn't have a light above the sink, and after searching high and low, decided to try this out. Went up easy and is lightweight. Put in an LED bulb and it does work well. Changed out the hooks for smaller ones bought at a hardware store to help with the aesthetic. Also purchased a wireless light switch+plug and mounted the switch part next to the other light switches for ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonT

customer_reviews.title: Light weight perfect light solution
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light for above my dining table. Our house has a pitched ceiling, and not very many light fixtures in the main living area. This worked perfect for our use. Cord has on off switch on it, and it is light weight enough to hang from our ceiling without needing reinforcement. We've had it for over the year and still no issues. I was disappointed that they ship in the packaging and not in a shipping box, as the box came in damaged, but fixture works great and Has no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea R.

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is perfect. Light weight and easy to hang. I placed a small bulb into it, and the plastic shade is deep enough so that you cannot see the bulb from across the room. My eyes are very sensitive to light. This swag lamp replaces a $85 lamp that I bought with a glass shade and metal chain link around the cord. It was very heavy and the shade was shallow. The bulb hung below the glass shade which bother my eyes and my husband complain about it every time I turn it on. My husband now asks me to turn this lamp on when more light is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not expensive. Actually the same product on another well-known free shipping shopping site was twice the cost as listed on Amazon. My mistake. I thought the reviews about the light were just that particular light - not. Be aware that the quality of the most important piece - the globe - leaves a lot to be desired. The plastic was warped and even when hung it was off balance plus I suspect it may become discolored eventually from the light bulb. Your choice. I took mine to Goodwill. Out $16.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow, just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new doublewide for my lake house. Got a great deal, but it needed a light over the kitchen sink. I wanted one i could turn on and off without a wall switch. the cord is very very long. Hubby will shorten it. It matches all the other light fixtures and looks fantastic for the low price. I put in a regular 60 watt bulb and that is perfect. I thought i needed 100 watt, but 60 is perfect. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, Do Not Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only needed this for a washer and dryer closet. Light started to flicker after second use and stopped working... The wire is very poorly attached to the switch and just fell out. I ended up just twisting and attaching the wires to each other and use it as a plug in light since its a low traffic area.
customer_reviews.author: Some Random Guy

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically it’s not good. Looks cheaper than pictured. The clear cord use means that the dark wires inside show, not that it blends in with the wall. There is no mechanism to shorten the cord i.e. hide the excess; I ended up wrapping it around itself. If I hadn’t bought it for over the bathroom sink, where I don’t look at it much, I’d have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Glad I went with the inexpensive version first, and we are sticking with it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pendant light. Bought it to try out a pendant light in our living room because I wasn't sure if one would work in there or not. The plan was to buy this inexpensive one and upgrade to a nice glass one if we liked having a pendant light instead of a floor lamp. We ended up just using this one permanently. It doesn't look cheap and I like that the cord is in a clear casing. Keeps attention off of it and helps it to blend in, instead of the more expensive glass ones that usually have bulky metal chains. Glad I went with the inexpensive version first, and we are sticking with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking light!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered 3 of these and found I could use another two in a different room. They are easily assembled and the cord is very long, making it easy to hang at almost any height. The bulb is centered away from the shade- no worry about it singing or melting. The price is exceptional! They arrived in a well-packaged and on-time condition. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: K. Obrien

customer_reviews.title: These met our needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: We had a room in our new house with exactly zero wired lighting. We wanted some lights over our board gaming table but we did not want to spend a ton of money on it yet—newlywed first time home owners have bigger fish to fry. I ordered two of these and they are PERFECT for our needs right now. One shade was slightly deformed in the box but I was able to mold it back into shape. You cannot beat this price, and the flexibility to quickly move them around is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: great price and style!
customer_reviews.text: This light was exactly what I was looking for, my parent's new apartment has no wiring in the living room and management will not allow any changes. I can hang this in the center of the ceiling and it should be enough light for them when they are hanging out there or have visitors. Overall it looks modern and I like that the shade is plastic which is good in case my little nephews happen to throw a ball and hit it. The price is great and the installation looks easy enough, I may get two more for their bedrooms along with the wireless switch.
customer_reviews.author: ruby

customer_reviews.title: Well then.
customer_reviews.text: Where to start: 1) the box was destroyed even tho the box it was shipped in was perfectly fine. 2) the plastic lamp shade is a weird oval shape. It's not even circular 3) it flickers; I've tried 3 different bulbs and 2 different outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schacht

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my choice in the lamp
customer_reviews.text: I needed lighting in my living room dining area...This hanging lamp filled the criteria and price at this time. I thought it was glass shade ( did not read description) but it is plastic Easy to put up..just plug in Can purchase the chain later to cover cord. Great for the price Only thing was the company had this sticker on the lamp and could not get the awful glue off the lamp. Call company and told them to consider this issue..do not need heavy glue for the sticker. Did come off but took several methods..they call back and listened. So perhaps they will use a different sticky glue
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy because some of the reviews said that it came in damaged, which based on how tight the shade was attached to the cardboard u could understand how it happened. But mine was perfect. I needed a non permanent solution for my puzzle corner because it's a temporary spot until we get situated. And the floor lamps cast a shadow because the light came from one side. So I wanted something that was chandelier like but not hardwired, and this is PERFECT! I love it. I just got it today and set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: My Room has Light !
customer_reviews.text: For 25 years my bedroom has not had an over head light. We have lamps in the corners, but never good lighting. This wonderful lamp has changed all this ! The lamp does not cost much money, so don't think it will look like a million bucks. I think it took 10 minutes to put up if that, and it is just great!
customer_reviews.author: AnnHennessy

customer_reviews.title: Danger! This need to be recalled!!
customer_reviews.text: After using this lamp for 5 weeks, the switch that turns the light on and off shorted out and began shooting sparks, regardless of whether the light was even on. We had this in our daughter's room and I'm horrified at the thought of what could have happened. Do not buy this under any circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Injustus

customer_reviews.title: Switch too close to outlet
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be perfect for a small area I have. I looks really cute and would be PERFECT it the switch was 6" father away from the plug/outlet. I was so bummed to have to return it. An electrician wants $250 just to hardwire a light. That's insane. Luckily amazon has a great collection of lights so I'll keep looking. I'm giving it more stars because amazon is easy enough to work with.
customer_reviews.author: J. M

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly was it says it is & works great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. It is a simple swag light with a plastic shade. The shade was not warped at all and it meets the need we had for a temporary light above a work table.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra kitchen light.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this light! We live in a small home and needed just a little more kitchen light for food prep. We added a bright 60 watt LED bulb, and it is PERFECT! I will be ordering another for my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have all switched outlets in the home i rent, so this was a great product to get some light fixtures up on the ceiling. Cord length is great for all 3 of the rooms i put them in. I love the plastic because i was not able to drill the hooks into a rafter. The light weight makes it easier to hang. I would recommend purchasing swag hooks for hanging because the hooks included in the package didnt work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingFromYou

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bright light for a corner that does not have an overhead lamp in the bedroom. This light was easy to install by plugging it into the wall. I hid the cord behind a curtain and used one hook in the ceiling. It clearly states to not use anything brighter than a 60-watt bulb. I used a 40-watt bulb which worked perfectly. The packing was fine and the shade was not misshapen as others have received it. I am planning to purchase another one. I would not leave this light burning while away due to the plastic material but feel comfortable with it on when home.
customer_reviews.author: djrgrove

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Our apartment lacks any ceiling lighting in our living room so this type of lamp has been on my radar for a while. Not being able to find any hanging lamps in home depot or lowe's which didn't require hard wiring, this is the perfect solution. It lights the room very well and was totally easy to install. Used a 1/2" drill bit and slid the included drywall screw anchor and hook.. and, BOOM, done! Now we can see! =)
customer_reviews.author: Brent Jones

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be deceiving
customer_reviews.text: This light wired as expected and was as simple as plug it in and done, however the fixture shade itself was cheap plastic and warped. I had to go buy a $20 shade to use with it so it actually cost more than some of the others I could have bought of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Laundry room
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I don't really like plastic lamps and would not put this in my kitchen or dining area. That being said, I got it for over the laundry and it's perfect. I was afraid the cord would be too short but it was plenty long. I was afraid I would hate the switch by the plug, but it works out fine. I LOVED the fact it came with all the mounting pieces I needed, though I did swap out the big hangers for something a little more subtle. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elise LP

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This was an affordable option for a closet light for us but it's honestly just okay. The problem I have with it is the way the cord attaches to the ceiling. We reinforced the ceiling and cord connection with extra tools and hardware to ensure it didn't fall. It does put out decent light and is a good option for a temporary light.
customer_reviews.author: Steph L

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great for the Value!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING price point for this light! I live in a small studio that has horrible fluorescent lights on the high ceilings. Thanks to the length of the cord and type of light, this works perfectly over my tiny prep station! I can finally see without that terrible blue of the fluorescence. Mine did not come warped, as others did, and it comes with the hardware for hanging it from your ceiling. It took me about 20 minutes to install and it looks great! Might buy more for other areas of my studio as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson G.

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp in June 2017 and installed in a location that had periodic use. Soon after it had difficulty turning on and eventually would only turn on if the cord was held just right. Then one year after installation I went to turn it on and not only did it refuse to turn on with multiple tries, but the whole time it was sparking inside the mechanism. Now it does nothing at all. Nothing about it's use would have lead to damage to the cord. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: LivingLifeToday

customer_reviews.title: Has it's flaws
customer_reviews.text: For the money it's a great light. Mine came deformed, the shade. I don't know if in time it will even up. The threads for the ring that hold the shade on were crooked and I couldn't tighten it. Lastly ... My biggest pet ..... STICKERS on the metal part that shows. 2 of them. Tried to remove with Goo gone but the residue is still there. It's in my basement so will see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Globe Electric Amaris
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light in my bathroom above the sink. I tried out a lot of lights before I found this one, and it works perfectly. I sure wish I had found it sooner. I would buy this light again, and I received it just when they said it would come.
customer_reviews.author: susieq

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little hanging lamp. The cord is the perfect length, and off/on switch is in the right spot. I also got some of the remote control color changing light bulbs. Perfect combination.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It's just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! I was so worried about reading the the reviews and people being upset with it. But I love it. It's perfect for an office or a bedroom with low lighting. It's a plastic outer dome. I ordered one regular and two from the Amazon opened box reseller and all three looked and worked perfectly out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Nola

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but not appealing
customer_reviews.text: The shade portion of this light is badly formed, not uniform, and not at all round — see the photo I took of it. It will be adequate for my purposes, so I am keeping it. But, if you are looking for something more attractive, be aware that there is a reason for the low cost of this item. Aside from the asthetics, the hardware seems ok and the light functions well during the first use of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We rent used command hooks instead of the ones it came with perfect for rooms that switch controls power. Small living spaces so dont like to put lamps on floor which takes up additional space stylish and easy to assemble perfect look that we wanted
customer_reviews.author: De nice333

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I actually used the drill and screwed the ...
customer_reviews.text: I hung two of these over my triple dresser. With two LED bulbs, about 60 watts, I now have bright lights to see my makeup and hair. These are great. I actually used the drill and screwed the hooks in the ceiling ALL BY MYSELF! I plugged both into one extension cord, and then plugged the cord into the bluetooth wall plug. The switch for the bluetooth then becomes like a remote, able to switch on from anywhere. Got the switch from Amazon at the same time: AmerTrac RKF100LC.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and so easy to set up came with everything i needed to set up besides a drill haha! I ordered another for my daughter's room! My boys have been through 3 floor lamps because their rooms didn't come with built in ones and they kept break the floor lamp because it was just in the way and this was the next best thing instead of getting something installed!
customer_reviews.author: jenet

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. When you buy the cheapest pendant light you can find, you get the cheapest pendant light. That being said, it is a good value overall. The thin plastic light shade was slightly misshapen when I got it, but it wasn’t bad so I didn’t send it back. The cord is very long and the switch seems good. Generally pleased with the purchase, because I wasn’t expecting too much to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Edjohn66

customer_reviews.title: Not a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. Plastic lamp cut unlevel. The screw that holds the top and the lamp cover is not threaded properly so it stays loose. The white plastic has black occlusions in it like grease or a marker but is not removable and the plastic is scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over the sink
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small over the sink light to brighten things up a bit. I didn't want to have to go through all the hassle of hardwiring anything in my home, so I found this. It's perfect. Just hand the hook things and then plug in. I also purchased a wireless remove that I have it plugged into so it has it's own 'switch'. Perfect addition to my once dark sink.
customer_reviews.author: CDK

customer_reviews.title: You can do better than this
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but it's clearly a cheaply-made product, with rough, almost sharp edges on the plastic shade, and a switch that is so rough it hurts to turn it on. I wouldn't leave it on when I am not in the room, because I don't trust its wiring. Was at IKEA after I bought this and wished I had waited to buy, because theirs were far superior for the same price (or less). I use it in a utility room, so its quality is no big deal, but I would have been extremely dissatisfied with this in a more formal room.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazard....bad switch!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in August of 2017. It was easy to install...however as of September 2018 had to unplug and throw out due to switch sparking. I thought the light had burned out...I changed the bulb and noticed someone in household had unplugged it. I plugged it back in and turned on the switch and it started sputtering and flickering I turned it off and unplugged it immediately and smelled a burnt electrical smell. It was the switch...had to throw it out. Will try something else...not going to risk buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: tj8769

customer_reviews.title: Has a short in the switch
customer_reviews.text: I like this fixture but had to put some support on the inline switch because it would short out when any pressure was applied to the cord. It's a hanging lamp - seems like the connection should be reinforced at the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Mine was in great shape. Simple nice lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Was very nervous it would be misshapen like some other reviews, but it was perfect. Cord seems as god as all other cords, the toggles could be better, but I did not even expect them in the package! Great lamp for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, attractive, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I got this inexpensive fixture to use with the idea that if it worked well to have light in that space I would get a better one later. But it is attractive enough to keep it in that space indefinitely. And it was so easy to install, I got a second one for my laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, low cost, but bent, probably caused by poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's obviously cheap. Works great though! Like many others, mine came with a bent shade, but it's made out of something that feels almost like wax, but obviously more flexible and robust than wax because it doesn't break with any reasonable amount of force. I could probably throw it off a 4th story balcony and it wouldn't break. I'm not as resourceful as some of the other reviewers, so I didn't heat it up and mold it back into shape or whatever, but it isn't too noticeable. I hung it above my kitchen sink with the bent part facing the wall. I actually would buy another if I had another use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Minty Busby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: Picked up one of these for my office. This thing installs quick, has plenty of cord to be put right in the middle of my office. I'm using it with a hue smart bulb. Office is a 12ft x 12ft room and I couldn't ask for better usage. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Burgess

customer_reviews.title: good enough
customer_reviews.text: It's a light and it lights. What more do you want? The socket is metal and ceramic. The shade is plastic but it looks good and directs light very well. I gave it 4 stars because the hooks are unnecessarily large.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kautz

customer_reviews.title: Great for apartments
customer_reviews.text: I love this light I live in an apartment and we had to buy a lamp for our living room. I am so glad I looked for something else because this light has made such a difference. We have it hanging in the center of our living room and now we have light through out the living room and not just in one corner.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I needed
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I just moved to a bigger place and one thing I knew we would need were lamps. I ordered these to arrive the day we moved in and they've been a life saver. We have tiled ceilings and there are hooks on the metal between the tiles. We hung them from the hooks and it offered an excellent amount of light for each room for unpacking and settling in.
customer_reviews.author: Jerica

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice accessory to have
customer_reviews.text: This is nice with a nice pricetag as well.... can be used in several places in the house and works beautifully... I attached a dimmer cable and just makes this little jewel a pleasure to use. Not sure the on/off switch would be sturdy... so the dimmer switch solves that possible problem... plus can have as bright or dim as you like.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Only when on sale
customer_reviews.text: If this product hadn't been for $15 then I would probably take another star or two away. The plastic was a little cheap feeling and when assembled wasn't very well-centered. The globe came in quite an oblong shape and the cut-out for the bulb to thread through looked as if it were cut with a bread knife. For $15 it does the job, though and I just needed it to add some light to a corner of the apartment. I'll do as others have suggested and take a heat gun to the plastic globe piece and fix the shape that way.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Peschel

customer_reviews.title: extra lighting for dark corners in the family room
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these to add some extra light to a dark room. I did not want to spend a lot of money because this room is used by grandchildren. Granted the plastic shade is kind of flimsy and is oval because of the box it was in, but it looks good and I won't be upset if something happens to it.
customer_reviews.author: SC sue

customer_reviews.title: Love my well lit laundry.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very functional swag lamp. It is inexpensive and looks it with the plastic shade, but works perfectly in our laundry room where there was no wiring for a light fixture. We were able to swag the cord end with the switch over to the laundry room door giving us light when entering and exiting the room. Don't get me wrong, it is attractive enough for my need, a storage area, child's bedroom or dorm room. What I really love is that it didn''t cost a fortune and serves my purpose. I would recommend it to anyone needing instant light in an area of their home.
customer_reviews.author: RC6374

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Put it in the toy corner where my kids play that was very dark. I can't trust my toddler with a table lamp and I didn't want another floor lamp. Clear cord is nice. Love that it just plugs into the wall no hard wiring required. Ordered a second one for my bathroom that doesn't have enough light. Very affordable
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this lamp. Easily solved the problem I’ve had for years, no ceiling light fixture. The light is bright and easy to install. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Boddiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible cheap product. Light shade was so flimsy its even thinner than the plastic reusable storage bowls. Came misshapen and won't reshape to round. I realize it's cheap but it's also really cheaply and poorly made. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: peachlady

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The cord is long. And the light worked great. Attached it to the outlet that is connected to the switch in the room and it worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nala.

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy but gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small laundry room and I live in an handmade log cabin. There are barely any electrical outlets, and since everything is solid wood having electrical wiring installed is really difficult. I needed a light that would plug in, hang and have a switch that I could reach. This light is very bright. The shade is plastic and it's not fancy in any way, but it is exactly what I needed for the laundry room. It literally lights up the whole space perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KHalstead

customer_reviews.title: great illumination
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a space in my kitchen that has needed a light for years. No need of an electrician. I added a remote on/off switch and its all working together perfectly, the light itself is just right
customer_reviews.author: Tank

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried when the box seemed small but it was the perfect size to go over our son's desk. With the recommended led grow bulb, it lights up the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright & happy lighting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these swag lamps, (one to cover my computer and the other to cover my typewriter) The products are rather simple in design and patterns, but I consider the quality and simple functionality to meet all my needs. Good instructions, simplicity and speed of installation and most important, the price tags offer great price values. I couldn't expect better lamps anywhere for the price. Generous cord length and all the installation parts included complete the package
customer_reviews.author: gejome

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp! I actually cut the cord and installed it in place of an old chandelier. Using a Wyze smart bulb. It really changed the lighting and even the look of the space. The price point is also great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish light fixture, a great value
customer_reviews.text: Great light at a great price. I used Command hooks to hang them so I don't have to put holes in my ceiling. I used them as bedside lamps so I could use smaller nightstands and save table space. Highly recommended especially for renters.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Quick & easy lighting solution
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is lightweight and seemingly made out of nothing, but it gets the job done for what I needed it for. Would be nice if it had a switch (such as a pull chain or knob) on the light itself, instead of on the cord near the plug, also if it was just a bit cheaper I'd say 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight hanging lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for my daughter's room to make more floor space. The shade is plastic and the socket is ceramic. The lamp is lightweight enough that it didn't require extra hooks in the ceiling, and makes as much light as her previous floor lamp.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive light perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: The shade was a little warped, as others have commented. But needed a light over a bed where there was no way to have a side table and the ceiling was very old (plaster not sheet rock). This is a perfect light weight light that plugs into the wall, long enough cord to run from the ceiling down the wall corner to the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brett

customer_reviews.title: Light weight plastic shade
customer_reviews.text: This light is perfect for my needs. So glad it has a light weight shade. It glows bright and I'm not worried about it falling on my customer's heads! :)
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hegarty

customer_reviews.title: super light weight
customer_reviews.text: Plastic, super light weight.. cord is a good length for hanging and the package came with 2 ceiling hooks, molly bolts and attachments for the cord to hang from the hook. I didn't expect this to be spectacular for the price, so I am super happy with what I have. I have never had this much light in my bedrooms which is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn’t come in warped at all but the plastic was cut just a liiiiiittttle bit uneven. Not a huge deal for me as it hangs pretty high and I’m not staring at it all day. Could see it really bugging someone with ocd though so beware if you’re a particular person!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: Another great find. This light is exactly what I needed for so long. I kept asking some people where to get one . Well I got it here. For me this goes with everything in my house ,so easy to put up. It adjust to whatever height you would like . It has a handy switch to turn on and off. I am well satisfied with this product. Would buy again if need too.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Changed shade
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the shade so we got another on Amazon. (Pictures included) it comes with hooks and the cord is clear with a switch.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

product_meta.title: Globe Electric Amaris 1-Light Plug-In Pendant, Brushed Steel Finish, Frosted White Shade, 15ft Clear Cord, In-Line On/Off Switch 64413, 8.5"
product_meta.description:
Size:8.5"Frosted plastic shade and brushed nickel pair perfectly to add a timeless sophistication and contemporary charm to any space with Globe Electric's Amaris 1-Light Plug-In Pendant. Blending with all decor styles you can place this fixture anywhere in your home. The 15-foot cord allows you to adjust the hanging length and position without worrying where your wall socket is placed. Ideally suited for kitchens, restaurants, bars and dining rooms you can use the Amaris 1-Light Pendant anywhere you need a creative light. Requires one medium base 60W max bulb (sold separately). Check out Globe Electric's selection of vintage Edison inspired bulbs to create a truly unique look.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


view larger PLUG-IN PENDANT
Whether for a kid's room, dorm room, kitchen, or bedroom, brighten up any living space with this easy-to-install plug-in pendant.

With a plastic shade and brushed steel accented finish, it's suited for any decor, and you can easily adjust the height to fit your lighting needs, with no complicated hardwire installation required.


NO HARDWIRING
With a plug-in design, this pendant is fast and easy to install.


AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE COLORS:

view larger DIMENSIONS
view larger PERFECT FOR ANY ROOM

Kitchen view larger Kid's Room view larger Dining Room view larger BULB INFORMATION
Uses any standard 60W max A-type light bulb. Choose the technology that best suits your needs:


Incandescent: 60 Watts LED: 12 Watts CFL: 13 Watts Halogen: 43 Watts
feature_bullets: TIMELESS DESIGN: a frosted plastic shade and brushed nickel pair perfectly to add a timeless sophistication and contemporary charm to any space
ACCENT LIGHT: a perfect accent light for any space, this fresh and simplistic design is an elegant update for traditional and modern homes alike
ADJUSTABLE: the 15-foot hanging cord allows you to place this fixture wherever you need it most. Maximum Hanging Length: 189"; Minimum Hanging Length: 8"
EASY INSTALL: simply hang this piece on the provided swag hooks and plug it in for an effortlessly easy installation - can be hung from a sloped or vaulted ceiling

BULB REQUIREMENTS: 1x E26/Medium Base 60W Bulb (sold separately) ; SUGGESTED BULBS: To give your pendant a beautiful soft white glow try Product# 84029; To give your pendant a bright white light try Product# 84030; Change the bulb, change the look with Product# 01321

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
